meanings.definition: Ankylosaurs: a group of herbivorous dinosaurs characterized by their heavily armored bodies and clubbed tails.
meanings.sent1: The ankylosaurs roamed the prehistoric lands, their armored bodies protecting them from predators.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study ankylosaurs to learn more about the ancient world and its creatures.
meanings.sent3: The ankylosaurs decided to have a tail clubbing competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like that of an ankylosaur, unwavering and strong.
meanings.sent5: The children at the museum gasped in awe at the massive ankylosaurs skeleton on display.
